solution_line_template: He runs at {speed_music_mpm} miles per minute because {speed_music_mph} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{speed_music_mph}/{minutes_per_hour}={speed_music_mpm}>>{speed_music_mpm}

While the album is playing he can run {distance_with_music} miles because {album_length_minutes} x {speed_music_mpm} = <<{album_length_minutes}*{speed_music_mpm}={distance_with_music}>>{distance_with_music}

He has to run {remaining_distance} miles without the album because {total_distance_miles} - {distance_with_music} = <<{total_distance_miles}-{distance_with_music}={remaining_distance}>>{remaining_distance}
Without music he runs {speed_no_music_mpm} miles per minute because {speed_no_music_mph} / {minutes_per_hour} = {speed_no_music_mpm}

He will run the remaining {remaining_distance} miles in {time_no_music} minutes because {remaining_distance} / ({speed_no_music_mpm}) = <<{remaining_distance}/({speed_no_music_mpm})={time_no_music}>>{time_no_music}
It will take him {total_time_minutes} minutes in total because {album_length_minutes} + {time_no_music} =<<{album_length_minutes}+{time_no_music}={total_time_minutes}>>{total_time_minutes}
